name: OverShopped
description:
It's one of those days, where everyone is rushing to buy stuff during the sales, and unfortunately, you are one of them ! 

 

Your only way out of this hell is to buy enough on sale items at the sales booth (limited time only!) to satisfy your consumerist needs, but don't forget to pay!

Move with ARROW

Buy items with SPACE

 

Made during GMTK JAM 2020 with the theme "Out of Control"

By 

Brother_Main : Code & Level Design 

Amai Petisu : Art Background > https://twitter.com/Amaipetisu

Tori : Art Character > https://itch.io/profile/laboratori

Monogatari : Musics, Sfx & Voice

Chamoutte : Additional Voices 

Tools used

-GameMaker Studio 2

-Aseprite

-JuiceFX

-Audacity
